```{r setup, include=FALSE}
library(tidyverse)

set.seed(1234)

source("Generator2.R")
```


```{r}
# define number of diff signals
n_s.1 = 3
n = 20
n_exp = 500
p = 30


#Gen data
data = Gen_Method1(n_s.1,c(2,2,2),6,p,n)

# get a vector of strong signal
s.1 = c()
for (i in 1:n_s.1){
  s.1 = rbind(s.1,paste0("x",i))
}
s.1 = c(s.1)

# get the threshold

thre = sqrt(log(p)/n)

# get y 

beta = rep(c(3,0.1,0,1),c(n_s.1,12,p-n_s.1-12,1))

y =  data %*% as.matrix(beta)

# generate dataset for regression 

col_name = c()
for (i in 1:p){
  col_name = rbind(col_name,paste("x",i,sep = ""))
}
col_name = rbind(col_name,"y")

df = 
  as_tibble(data[,-1]) %>% 
  mutate(y = y) %>% 
  setNames(col_name) 

df%>% View

# AIC selection procedure

for (i in 1:n_exp)
{
  fit.forward = step(object = lm(y ~ 1, data = df),
                      scope = formula(lm(y ~ ., data = df)), 
                      direction = "forward", k = 2, trace = 0) 
  
 selected <- attr(x = fit.forward$terms, which = "variables")
 
 n_s.1_selected = sum(as.character(selected) %in% s.1)
 prop_s.1_selected = n_s.1_selected/length(s.1)
}
```
